title: Longfellow House Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth         A volunteer in period costume demonstrates a 19th century lawn game.   Do you like to explore? Are you fascinated by the country’s history or the marvels of nature? Would you like to learn how YOU can play a role in protecting some of the country’s most amazing natural and cultural treasures? If so, become a Junior Ranger!  Click here to learn how.
